flow-definition.description:
[JENKINS-69340](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-69340) reports that the embeddable build status does not honor context value. Works for me
[![Build Status](/job/Bugs-Individual/job/Bugs-60-000-to-69-999/job/JENKINS-69340-embeddable-build-status-syntax-generator/badge/icon?context=my-build&subject=JENKINS-69340%20context%20specific%20status)](/job/Bugs-Individual/job/Bugs-60-000-to-69-999/job/JENKINS-69340-embeddable-build-status-syntax-generator/lastBuild)
